channel.title: net on Go 中文档集
channel.description: Recent content in net on Go 中文档集

item.title: fcgi
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http/fcgi@go1.24.2 Package fcgi implements the FastCGI protocol. ​ fcgi 包实现了 FastCGI 协议。 See https://fast-cgi.github.io/ for an unofficial mirror of the original documentation.

item.title: http
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http@go1.24.2 Package http provides HTTP client and server implementations. ​ http包提供了 HTTP 客户端和服务端的实现。 Get, Head,

item.title: http/cgi
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http/cgi@go1.24.2 Package cgi implements CGI (Common Gateway Interface) as specified in RFC 3875. ​ cgi 包实现了 CGI（通用网关接

item.title: http/cookiejar
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http/cookiejar@go1.24.2 Package cookiejar implements an in-memory RFC 6265-compliant http.CookieJar. ​ cookiejar 包实现了一个内存中符合

item.title: http/httptest
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http/httptest@go1.24.2 Package httptest provides utilities for HTTP testing. ​ httptest 包提供了用于 HTTP 测试的实用工

item.title: http/httptrace
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http/httptrace@go1.24.2 Package httptrace provides mechanisms to trace the events within HTTP client requests. ​ httptrace 包提供了在 HTTP 客

item.title: http/httputil
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http/httputil@go1.24.2 Package httputil provides HTTP utility functions, complementing the more common ones in the net/http package. ​ httputil 包提供了 HTTP

item.title: http/pprof
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/http/pprof@go1.24.2 Package pprof serves via its HTTP server runtime profiling data in the format expected by the pprof visualization tool. ​ pprof 包通过其

item.title: mail
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/mail@go1.24.2 Package mail implements parsing of mail messages. ​ mail 包实现了邮件消息的解析。 For the most part, this package follows the syntax as

item.title: net
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net@go1.24.2 Package net provides a portable interface for network I/O, including TCP/IP, UDP, domain name resolution, and Unix domain sockets. ​ net包提供了一个可移植的网络 I/O

item.title: netip
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/netip@go1.24.2 Package netip defines an IP address type that’s a small value type. Building on that Addr type, the package also defines AddrPort (an IP address

item.title: rpc
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/rpc@go1.24.2 Package rpc provides access to the exported methods of an object across a network or other I/O connection. A server registers an object, making it visible as a service with the name

item.title: rpc/jsonrpc
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/rpc/jsonrpc@go1.24.2 Package jsonrpc implements a JSON-RPC 1.0 ClientCodec and ServerCodec for the rpc package. For JSON-RPC 2.0 support, see https://godoc.org/?q=json-rpc+2.0 ​ Package jsonrpc 实现

item.title: smtp
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/smtp@go1.24.2 Package smtp implements the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol as defined in RFC 5321. It also implements the following extensions: ​ smtp 包实现了 RFC 5321 中定义的

item.title: textproto
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/textproto@go1.24.2 Package textproto implements generic support for text-based request/response protocols in the style of HTTP, NNTP, and SMTP. ​ textproto 包为 HTTP、

item.title: url
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/net/url@go1.24.2 Package url parses URLs and implements query escaping. ​ url 包解析 URL 并实现查询转义。 常量 This section is empty. 变量 This section
